Hello,

 

My name is Andrew Forward.  I am a graduate student in computer =
science at the University of Ottawa in Canada (www.uottawa.ca).

 

As part=
 of my research, I am conducting a survey regarding software documentation.=
  In particular, I am looking at documentation from a software developer pe=
rspective as oppose to end-users.

 

As an avid reader of this newsgroup, =
I believe that your expertise would help further my research a great deal. =
 I hope that you will be able to complete the survey.

 

I would appreciat=
e if you would complete the on-line survey and provide feedback about your =
experiences.  As an incentive, all participants that complete the survey an=
d feedback form are eligible to win a portable mp3 player (http://www.sonic=
blue.com/audio/rio/rio_one.asp).

 

The survey is available at:

http://ww=
w.site.uottawa.ca:4333/docsurvey/

 

The feedback form is an email link av=
ailable once you complete the survey.

 

The deadline to complete this sur=
vey is Tuesday, April 16, 2001 at 11:00 am.

 

Should you have any questio=
ns, please contact me at aforward@... or call (613) 255 3492.

=
 

Thank you,

 

andrew f
